name: Rainy Fantasy [MiniJam8]
description:
A little game, for a MiniJam !

You wake up in front of your computer and a weird program want a password and you have to find it !
But something is weird in this place, only sounds allow you to see...

Controls:

-move : W, A, S, D + left Maj  or  Z, Q, S, D + left Maj
-look : mouse
-interact : "F"
-close UI : "Escape"

Have fun and rate the game ! ;)
